EN.help:
The bot is an assistant for students.

This bot was created to help UTMN students coordinate within the university.

List of commands:
/start - Launch the bot
/menu - Launch the menu
/lang [EN|RU]  - Language selection
/map  - Output of the UTMN map

contacts.contact_selection_committee:
Selection Committee

Recruiting and Development Center
Tyumen st. Lenina, 16
8-800-700-05-53
(call within Russia is free)
597759@utmn.ru

Opening hours
Monday - Thursday: from 9:00 to 18:00
Friday: from 9:00 to 17:00
Saturday, Sunday: day off

Remote acceptance of documents through a personal account works around the clock, without breaks and weekends.
contacts.contact_deans_office:
Dean's Office

Tyumen, st. Semakova, 18, hall 3rd floor
8 (3452) 59-75-95
ed@utmn.ru

Opening hours:
Monday - Thursday: from 8:00 to 18:00
Friday: from 8:00 to 16:45
Saturday: from 9:00 to 13:00 (without lunch)
Sunday is a day off
